titleStmt.title: The bar, against free admission to the Lords Supper, fixed. Or, An answer to Mr. Humphrey his Rejoynder, or, reply. By Roger Drake minister of Peters Cheap, London.
titleStmt.author: R. D. (Roger Drake), 1608-1669.

notesStmt.note: In two parts; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
